name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForHemopoieticStemCellTransplantation
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Hemopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to hemopoietic stem cell transplantation and is listed as an immunocompromised condition on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes hemopoietic stem cell transplantation. It includes bone marrow and peripheral stem cell transplantation.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
